about.title: About Us
about.intro: Buldhana Panchayat Samiti is a local self-government institution located in Buldhana Taluka, Buldhana District, Maharashtra. We are committed to improving the quality of life of rural citizens through rural development, social welfare, and local governance.
about.historyDesc: Buldhana Panchayat Samiti was established in 1962 under the Panchayati Raj system in Maharashtra. Since then, we have consistently contributed to the development of infrastructure, education, health, and agriculture in rural areas. Our efforts have enabled many villages in Buldhana Taluka to reach new heights of development.
objectivesList: Develop infrastructure in rural areas, such as roads, water supply, and sanitation.
Improve the quality of life through education and healthcare services.
Increase farmers' income by promoting agriculture and allied activities.
Implement special schemes for the empowerment of women and girls.
Ensure the benefits of government schemes reach villagers directly.
about.servicesIntro: Buldhana Panchayat Samiti provides the following services:
servicesList: Certificates: Birth, death, and residence certificates.
Social Security: Old-age pensions, widow pensions, and disability welfare schemes.
Healthcare: Primary health centers and vaccination campaigns.
Education: Management of Z.P. schools and scholarship schemes.
Rural Development: Employment generation and infrastructure projects under MGNREGA.
about.contactAddress: Buldhana Panchayat Samiti, Buldhana, Buldhana - 443001, Maharashtra

list.name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
list.desc: A national mission to provide banking services to all households, including opening bank accounts, debit cards, insurance, and overdraft facilities.

list.name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
list.desc: Provides financial assistance to build affordable houses for the poor, especially for EWS and LIG categories in rural and urban areas.

list.name: Ayushman Bharat Yojana (PM-JAY)
list.desc: Offers financial protection for secondary and tertiary healthcare services, providing up to 5 lakh rupees per family for free treatment.

list.name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)
list.desc: A scheme for the sustainable development of the fisheries sector, focusing on fish production, infrastructure, and employment generation.

list.name: Swachh Bharat Abhiyan
list.desc: A national campaign to promote cleanliness and sanitation, including ending open defecation and improving waste management.

list.name: PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana
list.desc: Provides 300 units of free electricity per month to 1 crore households through rooftop solar panels, promoting savings and green energy.

list.name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGA)
list.desc: Guarantees at least 100 days of wage employment per year to rural households, improving their livelihoods.

list.name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
list.desc: A scheme to promote the education and protection of girls, reducing gender discrimination and empowering girls.

list.name: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana (PMGKAY)
list.desc: Ensures food security for the poor by providing free food grains monthly, initially launched during the COVID-19 pandemic.

list.name: Maharashtra State Rural Livelihoods Mission (MSRLM)
list.desc: Focuses on poverty alleviation and livelihood improvement in rural Maharashtra through self-help groups.

officers.title: Government Employees / Officers at Village Level
officers.name: Name

services.title: Grampanchayat Services for Citizens
services.intro: The Grampanchayat provides numerous services for the development of citizens and resolving their issues. These services greatly benefit the people in rural areas.

village.title: Village Development Schemes
village.desc: The Grampanchayat implements various schemes for rural development, including roads, water supply, sanitation, education, and healthcare.

agriculture.title: Agriculture and Animal Husbandry
agriculture.desc: Guiding farmers, implementing agricultural schemes, and running animal husbandry and dairy programs.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Services
healthcare.desc: Organizing health camps, conducting vaccinations, providing health education, and implementing healthcare schemes.

education.title: Education
education.desc: Arranging primary & secondary schools, training teachers, implementing schemes, and running scholarships.

womenChild.title: Women and Child Welfare
womenChild.desc: Forming savings groups, training women for self-employment, running Anganwadis, and implementing welfare schemes.

socialJustice.title: Social Justice
socialJustice.desc: Implementing schemes for SC, ST, and OBC communities, ensuring justice, and resolving their issues.

disaster.title: Disaster Management
disaster.desc: Helping citizens during disasters, relocating them safely, and rehabilitating them after disasters.

services.howTitle: How Can Citizens Avail Grampanchayat Services?
howPoints: Visit the Grampanchayat office in their village and contact the officials.
Use the information on the Grampanchayat website.
Participate in programs organized by the Grampanchayat.
services.footer: The Grampanchayat is always ready to serve citizens.

applications.title: Grampanchayat Applications for Citizens
applications.intro: The Grampanchayat provides various application processes for the convenience of citizens. Through these applications, citizens can apply for various schemes and services.

housing.title: Application for Housing Scheme
housing.desc: This application is used to obtain financial assistance for poor and needy families to build or repair houses.

birthDeath.title: Application for Birth and Death Certificates
birthDeath.desc: This application is used to register births and deaths and obtain certificates.

pension.title: Application for Old-Age Pension Scheme
pension.desc: This application is used to provide financial assistance to the elderly.

disability.title: Application for Disability
disability.desc: This application is used to obtain a disability certificate for disabled individuals to avail government scheme benefits.

employment.title: Application for Employment Guarantee Scheme
employment.desc: This application is used to provide employment opportunities to people in rural areas.

agriculture.title: Application for Agricultural Schemes
agriculture.desc: This application is used to avail benefits of various agricultural schemes for farmers.

sanitation.title: Application for Sanitation Scheme
sanitation.desc: This application is used to obtain government assistance for building toilets or maintaining sanitation.

other.title: Applications for Other Services
other.desc: In addition, applications for many other services are available at the Grampanchayat.

steps: Citizens should obtain the relevant application form from the Grampanchayat office in their village.
Fill in all the required information correctly in the application.
Attach the necessary documents with the application.
Submit the completed application to the Grampanchayat office.

complaint.title: Complaint Redressal
complaint.heading: Grampanchayat Complaint Redressal for Citizens
complaint.description: The Grampanchayat is committed to resolving citizens’ complaints. Addressing citizens’ problems and grievances to ensure justice is the duty of the Grampanchayat.
complaint.register: How to Register a Complaint with Grampanchayat?

registerList.visit: In-Person Visit: Citizens can visit the Grampanchayat office and register their complaints with the relevant officials.
registerList.written: Written Complaint: Citizens can submit their complaints in writing to the Grampanchayat office.
registerList.online: Online Complaint: The facility to register complaints online is available on the Grampanchayat website.
registerList.phone: Complaint via Phone: Citizens can register their complaints by calling the Grampanchayat helpline number.

complaint.info: Information Required While Registering a Complaint:

infoList.name: Name and address of the complainant
infoList.subject: Subject of the complaint
infoList.docs: Documents related to the complaint (if any)

processList.register: After receiving the complaint, the Grampanchayat registers it.
processList.investigation: Relevant officials are appointed to investigate the complaint.
processList.decision: After the investigation is complete, an appropriate decision is made on the complaint.
processList.inform: The complainant is informed of the decision.

instructionsList.truth: Provide accurate and truthful information while registering a complaint.
instructionsList.docs: Submit all documents related to the complaint.
instructionsList.cooperate: Cooperate with the Grampanchayat for the resolution of the complaint.
